text: hey everyone Anthony fantano here

uh this was a pretty interesting metal
project just came out on Relapse Records
and
there's a bit of a concept behind this

mean they take on the job pretty well
you know they're blaring they're loud
they're in your face uh they're very
aggressive very aggressive horn playing
on this thing I will say I went into

lines of like a naked City or something
John Zorn related uh something like that
but I did not get that this felt more
like kind of a standard metal Affair
like oh hey this is like a death metal

not every track on this album takes on a
death title Vibe and even though

they do perform a variety of different

deal of the record is instrumental

readily so excitedly

long extended like
prank call outro to the final track that
just kind of is the cherry on top to how
ridiculous this record is you know if
there was ever a question from the
beginning to the end of the record that
is is the band not really taking

certainly that crank call moment that

they're not they're not taking

it's a metal record that you know
um
is is kind of clowning the audience I
